Chapter 4297 - Chapter 4297: 4296 Special Angler

Chapter 4297: 4296 special angler

Translator: 549690339

Wang Xian looked at the treasured sword in front of him and felt a little excited!

There was a limit to the number of weapons that an expert could control.

It was impossible for an expert to control treasures indefinitely.

For example, if a beginner-level expert were to control hundreds of Heaven’s origin fortunes, wouldn’t he be invincible in the universe?

That was not the case. An beginner-level expert could control a heaven’s origin fortunes treasure at most.

If he was given another treasure that had the combat power of a beginner-level heavenly yuan creation treasure, he wouldn’t be able to control it!

In addition, Heavenly Yuan creation treasures were hard to control even for Great Dao level powerhouses.

Especially if a great dao level powerhouse had two offensive heavenly Yuan creation treasures.

If he used them at the same time, it would be difficult for two offensive heavenly yuan creation treasures to give him two control-level combat power.

It would be very difficult for him to unleash the power of the two heaven-origin destiny-level treasures.

At most, it would be slightly better than one heaven-origin destiny-level treasure.

Of course, there was another possibility. It was possible to maximize his own strength and control more heaven-origin destiny-level treasures.

That was, he had one offensive, one defensive, and one supporting type.

The offensive, defensive, and supporting types did not interfere with each other. He could control more of them!

For example, an attack-type weapon. Since the five elements grinding mill and the Tai Chi Dragon disk contained the dragon soul, in fact, Wang Xian didn’t need to control it.

The Void Dragon Pool had the body of the Void Divine Dragon to control it, so he didn’t need it either.

Now that he had the supportive ancestral tree in his body, he could still control an attack-type treasure in his hands.

This seemingly powerful sword of light could enhance Wang Xian’s strength.

This enhancement was calculated based on this sharp sword.

And this sharp sword should have the power of a beginner in the Heaven’s origin creation stage.

Wang Xian’s heart was burning with passion.

If he could obtain this sharp sword and forge it slightly, his combat strength would be comparable to two great dao existences!

“If I want to obtain this sword of light, I need to be careful!”

Wang Xian was deep in thought. With a move of his palm, he used the power of light and darkness to create a space!

Following that, he took out the lamp of divination.

The lamp of divination was purely a supporting treasure. It did not provide much boost to one’s combat strength!

However, if it was used to predict danger, it would bring great benefits.

Buzz

Wang Xian injected a stream of energy into the lamp of divination. At the same time, a stream of information was transmitted into it.

Buzz

As the divination lamp lit up, an image was transmitted under the light!

Looking at this image, Wang Xian frowned!

In the image, he flew towards the god of light elements and grabbed towards the sword of light!

This triggered the fluctuations of the god of elements. A terrifying wave of energy attacked him.

He used all his strength to resist. Under the resistance, he triggered the fluctuations of the god of darkness elements. A certain balance was broken and a powerful force of darkness attacked him.

Facing the direct attack of two Great Dao level elemental gods, Wang Xian could not maintain the balance of yin and yang in his body at all!

Following that, violent energy covered him!

Buzz! Buzz! Buzz

Buzz! Buzz! Buzz

At this moment, Wang Xian saw the energy in the divination lamp burning crazily. It was depleting crazily!

According to the burning speed, the energy would burn out in at most five seconds!

As Wang Xian watched, he extinguished the divination lamp immediately!

Looking at the situation before him, there was already a result!

He failed!

Before he could grab the spatial sword, the balance of yin and yang in his body was broken.

Once the balance in his body was broken, he would naturally be attacked!

Therefore, he would fail if he tried to snatch it directly.

I have to think of another way. Besides, this divination lamp is indeed a powerful treasure. No wonder Saint Shan Tian risked his life to obtain this divination lamp. Impressive

Wang Xian thought to himself.

He put away the divination lamp and looked at the spatial sword again.

However, after thinking for a while, he still couldn’t think of a way!

He could use the light attribute to form a rope to grab it.

However, when his energy entered here, it would be assimilated by the power of light as well as the impact of the power of darkness.

A power that was too weak would be useless in the face of an attack from an elemental god that was close to the Great Dao level.

After thinking for a few minutes, Wang Xian could only shake his head in the end!

“Let’s go to other places first and think of a way!”

Wang Xian could only give up temporarily. He took a stroll around the surroundings before flying towards the direction of the Elemental God of darkness.

When he arrived at the side of the Elemental God of darkness, the dark energy here was much more than the light energy.

The surroundings were pitch-black and his vision was even worse than the other side.

Buzz! Buzz! Buzz

However, when Wang Xian was flying, a corrosive sound was suddenly heard.

This gave him a slight shock. He immediately looked in front of him.

A dark, substance-like energy that looked like liquid was looking down on his physical body.

“Good heavens, this substance-like energy that is filled with corrosion is indeed a treasure. I have overlooked it!”

Wang Xian wrapped it with energy as his eyes sparkled.

The corrosive material dark liquid had a radius of 100 meters.

This corrosive force could severely injure an expert who had just entered the Heaven’s origin realm.

If it was used to forge a weapon, it could be comparable to an expert who had just entered the Heaven’s origin realm.

Of course, this was different from the sharp sword. This special dark liquid needed to be refined at a later stage.

Otherwise, it wouldn’t be easy to control and use!

After putting it away, he continued to search around.

After a few hours, he once again obtained four darkness Elemental God fragments.

This made him very pleasantly surprised!

“Eh? This Is?”

When he continued to search, he was suddenly slightly stunned and looked ahead with a face full of surprise.

There was a dark elemental god fragment in front of him. However, this elemental god fragment had the appearance of a special demonic beast.

It had a blood-red pupil and looked like a living creature!

There was a thin rope above the elemental god fragment.

This rope was connected to this special elemental God fragment!

The thin rope extended all the way to the top. It looked extremely strange!

“What’s going on?”

Wang Xian looked at this special scene and his face was filled with astonishment.

This was obviously not formed in this area.

The fragment of the god of elements that was tied by the thin rope?

The thin rope?

At this moment, Wang Xian saw the fragment of the god of elements moving towards him!

However, Wang Xian could clearly sense that the fragment of the god of elements did not sense him.

He hesitated for a moment before retreating immediately!

Then, he took out the lamp of divination again!
